On the heels of information about novels, for those of you who do any 
torrenting, the 1970 television dramatization (tv asahi; was NET back then) of 
"Moeyo Ken" (aka "Burn, O Sword") has been uploaded today over on d-addicts.  
It's 26 episodes, no subtitles, and I have no idea what the overall quality is 
like.  If you have any interest, I wouldn't wait very long with the batch file 
being 9+GB.

h ttp://www.d-addicts.com/forum/torrents.php  I can't take you directly to the 
announcement page, but it's currently on the first page.  If it's not on the 
front, just search for it in the search box.

For those not familiar with "Moeyo Ken," it's Shiba Ryotaro's novelization of 
the life of Hijikata.

phil
